entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0108.9564] The concept us-gaap:LeaseIncome with a period duration starting on 2023-06-30 and ending on 2023-09-30 or 92 days with a reported value of 15,000 has a value greater than the value of the same element with a longer or equivalent period duration that starts on 2022-12-31 and ends on 2023-09-30 with a value of 0. The value 15,000 for the period of 92 days should be less or the same as the value 0 with a duration of 273 days assuming that the concept us-gaap:LeaseIncome cannot have a negative value. If the difference between the two numbers is insignificant, check that the decimals of the two values are appropriate. The decimal value of 15,000 is 0, and the decimals of 0 is 0. The properties of this us-gaap:LeaseIncome fact are: Period :2023-07-01 to 2023-09-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9564 Rule version: 26.0.9 - uamy_10q.htm 2

[DQC.US.0108.9564] The concept us-gaap:LeaseIncome with a period duration starting on 2024-06-30 and ending on 2024-09-30 or 92 days with a reported value of 10,000 has a value greater than the value of the same element with a longer or equivalent period duration that starts on 2023-12-31 and ends on 2024-09-30 with a value of 0. The value 10,000 for the period of 92 days should be less or the same as the value 0 with a duration of 274 days assuming that the concept us-gaap:LeaseIncome cannot have a negative value. If the difference between the two numbers is insignificant, check that the decimals of the two values are appropriate. The decimal value of 10,000 is 0, and the decimals of 0 is 0. The properties of this us-gaap:LeaseIncome fact are: Period :2024-07-01 to 2024-09-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9564 Rule version: 26.0.9 - uamy_10q.htm 2
